dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Gossypium​</line-height>
dataList.desc: When the Drenched Gossypium is in a Red-stained Gossypium state, gain (Gossypium value/2) Bleed and Bleed Count at Turn End
dataList.summary: Turn End: Gain (Gossypium value/2) Bleed and Bleed Count

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Red-stained Gossypium​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: Double the Bleed and Bleed Count applied by Attack Skills.
If the target has Gossypium, gain Clash Power +(Gossypium value/2)

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Ember​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
Max 5
Upon gaining Ember, convert {0} non-Wrath Affinity Skills into Wrath Affinity Skills.
When the Wings Part is broken, inflict Shimmering Ember equal to the value of Ember upon the last attacker; then, all Ember on self expires.

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Shimmering Ember​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
Max 5
Gain Spark when hit by a certain Skill. All Shimmering Ember expires.

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Spark​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
Combat Start: inflict Burn equal to Burn on self against 2 adjacent(based on Speed) units.
Cannot gain Ember when this unit has Spark.
Turn End: reduce the value by 1

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Contempt​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
Turn End: Lose 3 E.G.O Resource of the Affinity corresponding to the selected Skill Affinity.
Turn End: Gain 3 Damage Down next turn.

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Grasp​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
Max 3
Cannot act
Turn End: at 2- value, deal damage equal to half of the target's Max HP. Then, all Parts of Spiral of Contempt heals the same amount of HP as the damage dealt by this effect.
Turn End: reduce the value by 1.
If this effect brings the target's HP down to 0, the target can no longer be healed.

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Gaze​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
Deal +10% more damage for every Gaze value
Turn End: at 7 Gaze, gain 15 Bleed and replace this effect with Contempt.

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>All-beholding Gaze​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
Gain 1 at every Turn End.
Turn End: all units with Gaze take (4 x {0}) fixed HP damage and (4 x {0}) fixed SP damage.

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Grasp​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
Max 3
Cannot act
Turn End: at 2- value, deal damage equal to half of the target's Max HP. Then, all Parts of Spiral of Contempt heals the same amount of HP as the damage dealt by this effect.
Turn End: reduce the value by 1.
If this effect brings the target's HP down to 0, the target can no longer be healed.
